title: Integrate uploaded QH monogram logo into site header and hero

requirements.summary: Replace the current generated 'Q' monogram placeholder in the site header with the uploaded QH monogram logo image (qh-logo.png). Display it as the left-aligned logo lockup with the 'Quindore Holdings LLC' wordmark text in Playfair Display. The logo must be sized appropriately for the fixed header (height ~40–48px on desktop, ~32px on mobile) and must render on the dark header background without a white box or border using the transparent-background version of the asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The QH gold monogram logo image is displayed in the Header, left-aligned, at correct proportions
The logo background is transparent — no white box visible against the dark header
On mobile the logo scales down gracefully without cropping
The 'Quindore Holdings LLC' wordmark text appears beside the monogram in Playfair Display
The logo links to the home page (/)

file_operations.description: Replace the current placeholder logo in the Header component with the uploaded QH monogram logo image located at frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.dim_256x256.png. Update the logo lockup to display the transparent PNG monogram at the appropriate size (h-10 md:h-12 for ~40–48px on desktop, h-8 for ~32px on mobile) alongside the 'Quindore Holdings LLC' wordmark text in Playfair Display. Ensure the logo is wrapped in a Link component that navigates to the home page (/). Verify that the transparent background renders correctly on the dark header without a white box.
